data.title: Cricket in the Genes, George Bailey by Martin Rogers | HB
data.meta_description: This book explores the colourful and varied family history of Tasmanian sporting royalty, from the former Tigers and Hobart Hurricanes captain, George Bailey, back to his great-great-grandfather George Herbert Bailey and beyond. data.text:
This book explores the colourful and varied family history of Tasmanian sporting royalty, from the former Tigers and Hobart Hurricanes captain, George Bailey, back to his great-great-grandfather George Herbert Bailey and beyond.

Sporting links across generations are not uncommon, but for sheer longevity there probably isn't a story to compare with that of the Baileys, who have connections with a swag of other distinguished Tassie families.
